_source.text: 1.5 What will make a positive difference is our levelheadedness in the face of these surmountable challenges and our collective commitment to deal with the difficulties head-on, bearing in mind that the world out there, and indeed our own people here at home, are fast loosing confidence in and patience with most of us in decision making positions be it in politics, commerce, local authorities, industry or parastatals because of our failure to deliver a better life to our people.
